channel.title: Crossbow attack anim
channel.description:
so ive just added ccb, and basically i cant see to get the correct attack animation for it. ive checked all over google etc and nothing is helping.
what i did was everything that was the rune cbow i added chaotic cbow too also.
would be much apprciated if someone could help me out. thank you.
also heres my combatassistant.java http://pastebin.com/d8zA95q1
